description: The Greniers d'Abondance initiative, established in 2019, focuses on enhancing food resilience in local territories. It conducts research, produces accessible resources, and supports stakeholders in the food system. The initiative aims to empower local authorities and communities by providing tools and knowledge to address food security challenges, particularly in the context of climate change. Through collaborative efforts, it fosters awareness and advocacy for sustainable food practices across various regions.
name: Les Greniers d'Abondance
